participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and adventurous, Emily loves to express herself creatively.
participant_1.background: I think it's cool that I'm able to serve my country and protect my family. I am allergic to dust. My family owns a farm. I went to college and graduated few years ago. I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Supportive and thoughtful, Jake values family bonds and cherishes his relationships.
participant_2.background: I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army. I'm the youngest of five. My wife and I enjoy long Sunday drives. I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise. I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.

content.text: Good! A bit nervous about my upcoming deployment.
Oh no! Sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll do great! My brother is leaving for the army too.
Thanks! I hope so. What's your favorite thing about your brother?
He's always there for me. Even when I was a kid, he would always defend me and stand up for me.
That's sweet! I'm the youngest of five so I don't have that experience.
Oh wow! That's a lot of siblings!
Yeah, it can be a bit chaotic sometimes. But it's also really fun.
I can imagine! Do you get along well with all of them?
